title: Graphics::FillClosedCurve(IN const Brush,IN const PointF,IN INT,IN FillMode,IN REAL) (gdiplusgraphics.h)
description: The Graphics::FillClosedCurve method creates a closed cardinal spline from an array of points and uses a brush to fill, according to a specified mode, the interior of the spline. (overload 1/2)
